doc:
Rufe Davis https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rufe_Davis 0 Rufe Davis (December 2, 1908 – December 13, 1974) was an American actor. He appeared in over 30 films between 1937 and 1969, including 14 of the Three Mesquiteers titles. Davis played railroad conductor Floyd Smoot on the CBS television series Petticoat Junction from 1963–1968 and in 1970 guest appearances. Rufe_Davis ( December_2_,_1908 – December_13_,_1974 ) was an_American_actor . He appeared in over_30_films between 1937_and_1969 , including 14 of the_Three_Mesquiteers_titles .
